features.title: A high-level **Sales Manager Dashboard** focused on revenue tracking and team co
features.description:
A high-level **Sales Manager Dashboard** focused on revenue tracking and team comparison.

**Target Audience:** Sales Managers.
**Primary Goal:** Monitor team performance trends and compare against other teams at a high level.

**Key Features & Layout:**
1.  **Executive Summary Cards (Top Row):**
    *   Display critical KPIs for quick health checks.
    *   **Metrics:** Total Revenue (YTD) and % Growth vs Last Year.
    *   *Design:* Big, bold numbers with trend indicators (green/red arrows).

2.  **Main Revenue Trend:**
    *   **Visualization:** A clean, easy-to-read **Line Chart** showing revenue over time.
    *   **Default View:** Year-to-Date (YTD).
    *   *Interaction:* Simple tooltips on hover (no complex drill-down/click-through to reps).

3.  **Global Filters (Sidebar or Top Bar):**
    *   **Team Selector:** Dropdown to switch the view between different Sales Teams (e.g., "Northeast Team" vs "Enterprise Team"). *Single view approach.*
    *   **Time Period:** Quick toggles for This Month, This Quarter, YTD.

**UX Priority:** Clean, un-cluttered interface suitable for presentation or quick review. Avoid data overload.
